name: BlockIO Cloud Wallet Adapter
description: Allows your Bitcoin and Altcoin Wallets WordPress plugin to interface with your block.io cloud wallet account.

name: CoinPayments Adapter
description: Allows your Bitcoin and Altcoin Wallets WordPress plugin to interface with your CoinPayments.net cloud wallet account.

name: Dogecoin RPC Adapter
description: Allows your Wallets plugin to interface with the Dogecoin daemon (dogecoind).

name: Electrum Bitcoin RPC Adapter
description: Allows your Wallets plugin to interface with the Bitcoin Electrum Bitcoin wallet.

name: eMark RPC Adapter
description: Allows your Wallets plugin to interface with the Deutsche eMark wallet.

name: Feathercoin RPC Adapter
description: Allows your Wallets plugin to interface with the Feathercoin daemon (feathercoind).

name: Goldcoin RPC Adapter
description: Allows your Wallets plugin to interface with the Goldcoin daemon (goldcoind).

name: Goshencoin RPC Adapter
description: Allows your Wallets plugin to interface with the Goshencoin wallet.

name: Gridcoin RPC Adapter
description: Allows your Wallets plugin to interface with the Gridcoin daemon (gridcoinresearch).

name: Litecoin RPC Adapter
description: Allows your Wallets plugin to interface with the Litecoin daemon (litecoind).
